title: Darwin, Northern Territory
summary: Darwin /ˈdɑːrwɪn/ (listen) (DAR-win) is the capital city of the Northern Territory, Australia. The city is known as Garramilla to the traditional owners of the area, the Larrakia people,[7] a word which refers to the white stone found in the area.[8] With an estimated population of 147,255 as of 2019, the city contains the majority of the residents of the sparsely-populated Northern Territory.[9]
